name: Inseong Kim (김인성)
role: Maritime Deck Officer · Korea / Worldwide · Offshore & DP Track (Target)
summary: Deck Officer with experience in coastal operations and watchkeeping; strong focus on safe navigation and SMS/ISM compliance.
Hands-on with bridge equipment and documentation; comfortable with structured reporting and incident prevention.
Actively building data/automation projects (Python, WebSocket, DB) to improve operational visibility and decision-making.

bullets: Bridge watchkeeping, passage planning, voyage reporting, and safety management routines.
Port operations support; coordination with master/engine department for safe maneuvering.

bullets: Implemented resilient WebSocket client with reconnect/backoff for real-time market data ingestion.
Designed storage layer and schema to support downstream analytics (OHLCV aggregation planned).
Tech: Python 3.12, uv, asyncio, websockets, SQLite (Postgres roadmap).
